title: Delta Colored Candles
content:
The indicator calculates the total delta for a certain period and determines how close this value is to the set maximum. In this case, the candles are painted in accordance with the color scheme.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

General

NameDescription
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Maximum delta Delta volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Color scheme Allows you to select a range of colors to color elements.

Options:
  • DarkToOrange
  • DarkToRed
  • LightToRed
  • Grayscale
  • VioletToYellow
  • VioletToYellow2
  • RedToLightToGreen
  • OrangeToDarkToGreen
  • RedToDarkToGreen
  • DarkToVioletToRed
  • DarkToBlue
  • DarkToBlueToGreen
  • DarkToGreen
  • DarkToRedToLight
  • LightToPink
  • LightToBlue
  • LightToDarkToGreen
  • LightToGreen
  • LightToPinkToRed
  • PinkRedGraBlue
